Chris Porter, Graphic Designer

About | Learn more about me

I’m a graphic designer, currently living in Brighton. As a designer I strive for simple solutions to help others communicate and connect with audiences in meaningful ways.

All my projects start with an informal chat about what you would like to achieve. To learn more about how I work, have a look at what I can do for you.

I enjoy working with people who are excited about what they make or do and share interests in sustainability. If that sounds like you and you would like to work together let me know.

Me looking at a screen, sat at a desk

I share and occasionally write on LinkedIn. For bits & pieces I made, see or do I use Tumblr. This site, and others, can be seen on my Github.

See what I can do for you or get in touch
